name: Mermaid Princess
description:
Quite a time ago I merged the Lolita fashion trend with my passion for mermaids in a drawing and this little lady came out and there for her own Tumblr theme!
It took me 2 whole days to put it all together and I hope you all enjoy it as much as I do. 
Looks best with 1024 Ã— 768
Don't forget to follow me at http://dilancreroyalty.tumblr.com/
